EmailTemplate.name: Notice to Manager that Self Assessment is completed
EmailTemplate.subject: Self Assessment completed by {!Sales_Competency__c.User__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Sales_Competency__c.Level_1_Manager__c}
{!Sales_Competency__c.User__c} has completed his Self Assessment. To view the assessment, click this link: Sales Competency.
Please review and complete the Manager Assessment. when complete, change the status to In Review (Employee)
-- sent automatically from Salesforce.com --
